scripts.start:services: cd services/ && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.development.yml up -d --build
scripts.start:services:ci: cd services/ && docker --log-level 'warn' compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.ci.yml up -d --quiet-pull --no-recreate --no-build
scripts.start:interfaces: npx npm-run-all --npm-path npm --print-label --parallel start:pa start:aw start:portal
scripts.install:services: cd services/ && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml build
scripts.install:interfaces: npx npm-run-all --npm-path npm --print-label --sequential install:pa install:aw install:portal
scripts.code:all: code ./ && npx npm-run-all --npm-path npm --parallel code:121-service code:aw code:pa code:portal
scripts.test:121-service: cd services/ && docker compose exec 121-service npm test
scripts.test:interfaces: npx npm-run-all --npm-path npm --print-label --sequential test:pa test:aw test:portal
scripts.install: echo 'Nothing to install here. See README.md#getting-started \n\n' && exit 1
